column1: Smoque BBQ////Been here twice now and I wouldn't change a thing. Had the sliced brisket last week and baby back ribs the other day. Both were very tender and juicy and cooked perfectly.  I've tried the mac not cheese
column3: Cole slaw and corn bread sides and also the peach cobbler.  All were very tasty and I wouldn't change a thing. I love that they have multiple sauces for different tastes.  I prefer the Carolina style but both are very good. I'm looking forward to trying something different next time.
